column1: Little Goat Diner////Shared the macho nachos and the chips were especially amazing. Then tried the Goat Almighty. Can't say I had it
column2: because I only got through a small piece of it. Need to come here hungry. This burger was a tower of meat and stuff. I had to lay it down. Got through the goat burger
column4: and the tortilla with jalapenos at the bottom. My friend took the rest home to her bottomless pit of a husband.
